20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Humaid bin Abdur-Rahman said:"Whoever misses his Wird at night, let him recite it during prayer before Zuhr, and that will be equivalent to night prayers

chapter.ara-name: باب مَتَى يَقْضِي مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ حِزْبِهِ، مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: When should a person who slept and missed reciting his nightly portion of Qur'an make it up
